reporting_cycle: semi-annually, not later than 45 days prior to its expiration
summary:
* Calls on the UN system and the international community to devise and support a renewed aid coordination system and accelerate disbursement of pledges (para 19).
* Welcomes progress in MINUSTAH's communications and public outreach strategy and requests it to continue these activities (para 20).
Requests the Secretary-General to: ensure MINUSTAH personnel comply with the UN's zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse, keep the Council informed, and report semi-annually on MINUSTAH's mandate implementation. The report should include: a review of MINUSTAH's activities and composition, coordination with the UN country team, a comprehensive security threat assessment, and a consolidation plan with benchmarks. Urges troop-contributing countries to investigate and punish acts involving their personnel. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
